events.message: The applicant submitted the auto loan application online to finance the purchase of a new car.
Loan department categorized the application as an Auto Loan based on the details mentioning a car purchase.
Loan officer James Liu was assigned to handle the applicant's auto loan request promptly.
Initial review was conducted on the submitted documents and application form for completeness.
Applicant was asked to provide proof of income, vehicle details, and identity verification documents.
The applicant submitted all requested documents including recent payslips and the vehicle purchase agreement.
Credit history and score were checked and found to be within acceptable limits for the auto loan.
Risk assessment concluded that the loan has a low-risk profile based on income and credit records.
An auto loan offer with an interest rate of 4.5% and a term of 60 months was presented to the applicant.
The applicant confirmed understanding of terms and expressed satisfaction with the loan offer.
The loan officer approved the auto loan after confirming all compliance and underwriting criteria were met.
The approved funds were transferred to the dealerâ€™s account to finalize the vehicle purchase for the applicant.
A follow-up call was made to the applicant to ensure satisfaction and answer any questions after funding.
The loan application process was officially closed as all required steps were successfully completed.
